title: [管理|娱乐]GtaCops —— 在游戏里添加GTA的通缉星级与警察吧! 更新至1.13[1.8.X-1...
author: x602701a
txt_content:
本帖最后由 x602701a 于 2019-2-15 22:04 编辑 

萌新的我又回来了
给大家带来一款有用的插件

GTA警察  [1.8.X-1.11.2]
=====================================================
注意:
这个插件的名字代表了一切, 它具有追杀杀人的玩家的奖励的系统
无论何时一个人杀死某个人时，他的通缉警星就会上升
增加杀死的人数将会导致通缉警星上升
===========================================
游戏模式：
>杀死玩家来得到星星(设置的等级)
>当你得到通缉警星时，猪人警察就会出现
>被警察杀死时通缉警星将会清零
>被玩家杀死时通缉警星将会清零
>获得星星的等级和需要杀死的玩家数可以被设置
===========================================
警告
>杀死被通缉的玩家可以赚钱
>杀死警察可以得到特别奖励
===========================================
特点
>可以高度配置的config.yml
>可以配置语言文件Message.yml
>重载指令
>随时可用的帮助
>自定义死亡的主title和副title
>商城里最好的插件之一
===========================================
绿油油的指令/权限

玩家命令：

/gtacops : 显示插件所有的命令/murders : 查看你被警察所记录的杀人记录/wantedlvl : 查看你的通缉等级/decreasewant : 降低1个通缉等级(滴，杀人卡)/trackplayer: 追踪一个被通缉玩家的位置[你必须要用指南针]/untrackplayer: 停止追踪玩家

OP命令：

/wlreset : 让在线玩家的通缉警星归零/gtareload: 重载配置文件/givelma: 给玩家杀人卡/statscheck : 检查在线玩家的数据


权限：

GTACops.user : 允许使用玩家命令GTACops.user.track: 允许使用追踪玩家的命令GTACops.admin : 允许使用OP命令




配置文件:

#*********************************************************#
#GTACops#配置文件尚未更新 待补 兼容性未知
#Version 1.4.2
#Author: IcyFlameX
#翻译:x602701a
#*********************************************************#
#插件会起效果的世界
Worlds:
- world
#如果你想让通缉星数出现在Tab列表或NameTags上，设置为true
Enable_Stars: false
#如果你想要杀死被通缉的玩家有奖励，把它设置成true
Enable_Rewards: false
#如果你想关闭title和子title,设置这个为false Title & SubTitle
Enable_Title: true
#---------------------------------------------------------#
#                           MURDERS
#---------------------------------------------------------#
#杀死多少人会被通缉1星
Kills_Wanted_LvL1: 1
#杀死多少人会被通缉2星
Kills_Wanted_LvL2: 2
#杀死多少人会被通缉3星
Kills_Wanted_LvL3: 3
#杀死多少人会被通缉4星
Kills_Wanted_LvL4: 4
#杀死多少人会被通缉5星
Kills_Wanted_LvL5: 6

#---------------------------------------------------------#
#                            Cops
#                        Configuration
#---------------------------------------------------------#
#**************************#
#          Name
#**************************#
#设置猪人警察的名字
Name: "&4&lPolice"
#**************************#
#          TotalNumber
#**************************#
#一星通缉警察的数量
Cops_LvL_1: 2
#二星通缉警察的数量
Cops_LvL_2: 3
#三星通缉警察的数量
Cops_LvL_3: 4
#四星通缉警察的数量
Cops_LvL_4: 5
#五星通缉警察的数量
Cops_LvL_5: 6
#**************************#
#          Cop's Armor                  
#**************************#
#Link for all the Materials in Minecraft[ MAKE SURE U PASTE AS ITS WRITTEN IN THE WEBSITE]
#https://dev.bukkit.org/projects/supplies/pages/material-list
#Weapon to be carried by the Cops
#一星警察的武器
Cops_Weapon: STONE_SWORD
#帽子
Cops_Helmet: LEATHER_HELMET
#胸甲
Cops_Chestplate: LEATHER_CHESTPLATE
#护腿
Cops_Leggings: LEATHER_LEGGINGS
#靴子
Cops_Boots: LEATHER_BOOTS
#二星警察
Cops_Weapon2: GOLD_SWORD
Cops_Helmet2: LEATHER_HELMET
Cops_Chestplate2: LEATHER_CHESTPLATE
Cops_Leggings2: LEATHER_LEGGINGS
Cops_Boots2: LEATHER_BOOTS
#三星警察（恕我直言这金套有毛用）
Cops_Weapon3: GOLD_SWORD
Cops_Helmet3: GOLD_HELMET
Cops_Chestplate3: GOLD_CHESTPLATE
Cops_Leggings3: GOLD_LEGGINGS
Cops_Boots3: GOLD_BOOTS
#四星警察
Cops_Weapon4: IRON_SWORD        
Cops_Helmet4: IRON_HELMET
Cops_Chestplate4: IRON_CHESTPLATE
Cops_Leggings4: IRON_LEGGINGS
Cops_Boots4: IRON_BOOTS
#五星警察
Cops_Weapon5: DIAMOND_SWORD
Cops_Helmet5: DIAMOND_HELMET
Cops_Chestplate5: DIAMOND_CHESTPLATE
Cops_Leggings5: DIAMOND_LEGGINGS
Cops_Boots5: DIAMOND_BOOTS
#**************************#
#          CopsHealth                 
#**************************#
#警察的最大血量为20
#警察血量
#对应一到五级
#TotalHealth of Cops for players in WantedLvL1
HealthLvL1: 10
#TotalHealth of Cops for players in WantedLvL2
HealthLvL2: 12.5
#TotalHealth of Cops for players in WantedLvL3
HealthLvL3: 15
#TotalHealth of Cops for players in WantedLvL4
HealthLvL4: 17.5
#TotalHealth of Cops for players in WantedLvL5
HealthLvL5: 20
#**************************#
#          CopsSpeed         
#**************************#
#使用速度药水效果来设置移动速度
#设置药水的时间
#一星警察的速度
#IntensityLvl1代表等级1警察的速度等级
#IntensityLvl2代表等级2警察的速度等级
#以此类推
IntensityLvL1: 1
TimeLvL1: 200
#Speed of Cops for players in WantedLvL2
IntensityLvL2: 1
TimeLvL2: 200
#Speed of Cops for players in WantedLvL3
IntensityLvL3: 1
TimeLvL3: 200
#Speed of Cops for players in WantedLvL4
IntensityLvL4: 1
TimeLvL4: 200
#Speed of Cops for players in WantedLvL5
IntensityLvL5: 0
TimeLvL5: 200
#**************************#
#       CopsStrength         
#**************************#
#使用力量药水效果来设置移动速度
#设置药水的时间
#一星警察的力量
#IntensityLvl1代表等级1警察的力量等级
#IntensityLvl2代表等级2警察的力量等级

#以此类推
Strength1: 1
Time1: 200
Strength2: 1
Time2: 200
Strength3: 1
Time3: 200
Strength4: 2
Time4: 200
Strength5: 1
Time5: 200
#---------------------------------------------------------#
#                            PayFine
#---------------------------------------------------------#
#减少一颗通缉警星的价格
Money_Deduction_Per_WantLvL: 500

#---------------------------------------------------------#
#                          LeaveMeAlone
#---------------------------------------------------------#
#杀人卡的物品ID
#Item Type for the CheatCard LeaveMeAlone
Item: PAPER
#得到杀人卡的几率
#awa好像只有OP可以得到
Chance: 100

#---------------------------------------------------------#
#                          Punishment
#---------------------------------------------------------#
#被警察杀死后的惩罚金钱
#等级1到5
#Punishment when player on Wanted Level 1.
PunishLvL1:
- eco take %player% 1500
#Punishment when player on Wanted Level 2.
PunishLvL2:
- eco take %player% 2500
#Punishment when player on Wanted Level 3.
PunishLvL3:
- eco take %player% 3500
#Punishment when player on Wanted Level 4.
PunishLvL4: 
- meco take %player% 4500
#Punishment when player on Wanted Level 5.
PunishLvL5: 
- eco take %player% 5500

#---------------------------------------------------------#
#                            Rewards
#---------------------------------------------------------#
#上面的设置需要设置为true才会有效
#**************************#
#      KillingPlayers       
#**************************#
#杀死一星通缉犯获得的金钱奖励，以此类推
LvL1Money: 250
#Money given for killing WantedLevel 2 Player.
LvL2Money: 650
#Money given for killing WantedLevel 3 Player.
LvL3Money: 1000
#Money given for killing WantedLevel 4 Player.
LvL4Money: 1500
#Money given for killing WantedLevel 5 Player.
LvL5Money: 2500
#**************************#
#       KillingCops       
#**************************#
#L杀死警察后获得的东西 LvL1Reward为一级警察，以此类推
LvL1Reward: DIAMOND_BLOCK
#Total Number. Eg 64 DiamondBlock. 64= TotalNumber.#Total Number. Eg 64 DiamondBlock. 64= TotalNumber.
ValueLvL1: 5
#Items to be given to players for killing each Cop, when the Killer is in WantedLvL2.
LvL2Reward: DIAMOND_BLOCK
#Total Number
ValueLvL2: 10
#Items to be given to players for killing each Cop, when the Killer is in WantedLvL3.
LvL3Reward: DIAMOND_BLOCK
#Total Number
ValueLvL3: 15
#Items to be given to players for killing each Cop, when the Killer is in WantedLvL4.
LvL4Reward: DIAMOND_BLOCK
#Total Number
ValueLvL4: 20
#Items to be given to players for killing each Cop, when the Killer is in WantedLvL5.
LvL5Reward: DIAMOND_BLOCK
#Total Number
ValueLvL5: 64

#---------------------------------------------------------#
#                            Title
#---------------------------------------------------------#
#玩家死亡后发送的title
Title: "&cBusted"
#Subtitle to be displayed on Screen.
SubTitle: "&bGet Rekt"
#Title & SubTitle to be displayed when a player of WantedLevel 1 kills
KTitle1: "&cDefault Tiltle"
KSubTitle1: "&bDefault Subtitle"
#Title & SubTitle to be displayed when a player of WantedLevel 2 kills
KTitle2: "&cDefault Tiltle"
KSubTitle2: "&bDefault Subtitle"
#Title & SubTitle to be displayed when a player of WantedLevel 3 kills
KTitle3: "&cDefault Tiltle"
KSubTitle3: "&bDefault Subtitle"
#Title & SubTitle to be displayed when a player of WantedLevel 4kills
KTitle4: "&cDefault Tiltle"
KSubTitle4: "&bDefault Subtitle"
#Title & SubTitle to be displayed when a player of WantedLevel 5 kills
KTitle5: "&cDefault Tiltle"
KSubTitle5: "&bDefault Subtitle"




汉化文件:

#==========================# #                         MESSAGE #                         GTACops #                          V1.4.1 #===============================# 
#Message for /murder 
MurderCommand: "&b罪犯:&e" 
#Message for /wantedlvl 
WantedLvLCommand: "&b通缉等级:&e" 
#Message when player has 0 WantedLvL already 
DecreaseWant1: "&b你现在没有被通缉！" 
#Message after wantedlvl gets decreased by /decreaswant 
DecreaseWant2: "&b你的通缉等级已经被减少了。 " 
#Message when player dont have enough money for decreasing their wantedlvl. 
DecreaseWant3: "&e大兄弟你没钱啊。" 
#Message for showing player how much they need to decrease their wantedlvl. 
DecreaseWant4: "&b你需要 &e$ " 
#Message displayed when they dont have GTACops.admin perms #Message displayed when player doesnt have GTA.user perm. 
NoGTAUserPerm: "&4你需要权限: GTA.user perm" 
#Message displayed when player doesnt have GTA.user.track perm. 
NoGTATrackPerm: "&4你需要权限 GTA.user.track perm" 
#Message displayed when player does not have Admin Perm. 
NoAdminPerm: '&4你需要权限 GTACops.Admin perm' 
#Message displayed when player isnt online. 
NotOnline: "&b玩家不在线！" 
#Message when player types wrong command of wlreset. 
WLResetWrong: "&b正确的用法： /WLReset  " 
#Message when WLReset is successful 
WLReset: "&b通缉等级已被重置" 
#Prefix for the broadcast. 
BroadCastPrefix: "&7&l[&c&l警察&7&l] " 
#BroadCastMessage for global players after player gets a new wantedlvl. 
BroadCastMessage: "&c&l现在你被通缉了！" 
#Message Part 1 for Rewards RewardMessage: "&b你被奖励了 &e$ " 
#Message Part 2 for Rewards RewardMessage1: "&b因为击杀玩家" 
#Message Displayed when Player earn rewards for killing Cops. 
CopKillReward: "&b因为杀死了一个警察，你被奖励了&e " 
#Reload Message Reload: "&bGTA警察已被重置！[汉化：x602701a]" 
#Message Displayed when no user does not specify a name during /trackplayer. 
NoNameTrack: "&b请设置一个玩家&ename." 
#Message Displayed when tracking player. 
TrackPlayer: "&b通缉指向 &e " 
#Message Displayed when player does not have any WantedLevel. 
TrackPlayerError: "&b这个玩家没有被通缉." 
#Message Displayed when player no longer wants to track the player. 
UntrackPlayer: "&b玩家追踪已停止" 
#Message when player types wrong command of givelma. 
lmawrong: "&b使用 &e/givelma &b " 
#Message when player is given LeaveMeAlone CheatCards 
lmacomplete: "&b已给予杀人卡" 
#Name of the CheatCard. 
CheatCard: "&b&l杀人卡" 
CheatLore:  - "&b右键让所有警察回老家！" 
- "&e设置你的杀人数为0"
